xmltooling::CredentialContext

xmltooling::CredentialContext Class Reference

Marker interface for implementations which hold information specific to a particular context within which a CredentialResolver resolves a Credential. More...

#include <xmltooling/security/CredentialContext.h>

Inheritance diagram for xmltooling::CredentialContext:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Marker interface for implementations which hold information specific to a particular context within which a CredentialResolver resolves a Credential.
